Enroll by August 31 to Receive the Current Rebate
The Residential Solar Investment Program provides rebates for homeowners and businesses in Connecticut who switch to solar. On September 1, the incentive level will be reduced by half! Don’t miss out on the savings provided by the current rebate. There has never been a better time to go solar. Astrum Solar offers a $1,000 discount*, cash purchase, monthly payment, and purchase financing options—all of which cost less now than they will after incentive reduction. In order to take advantage of the current incentive level, enroll with Astrum Solar by August 31, 2014.
Get Your Free Roof Survey! <http://www.astrumsolar.com/solar-by-state/connecticut-ct>
Turnkey Solar Solutions to Save You Money
Astrum Solar’s turnkey process makes it easy to switch to solar. Our team of solar experts personally handles every detail and turns a complex process into one that is smooth, simple and carefree for you. With our solar financing options you can go solar for $0 Down and start saving from day one and keep saving year after year.
Plus, a $1,000 Discount for Connecticut Residents!
Enjoy your independence from unpredictable electricity prices and lock in your own electricity rates. Choosing solar puts you in control of your own power generation and frees you from ever-increasing utility rates. Request your free roof survey today and take advantage of our $1,000 discount to Connecticut residents!*

You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in an Astrum Solar system installation.
*LIMITED TIME OFFER: Valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Astrum Solar by September 30, 2014. In lieu of a cash rebate, customers can opt to use the $1,000 as a down payment to reduce their monthly solar fees or to receive a $1,000 discount off the contract price at the time of their purchase. Otherwise, $1,000 cash back rebate to be mailed approximately 30 days after the system is installed. Minimum system size is 5 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Astrum Solar serves. Offer is in addition to other available promotions or discounts.
A solar power system is customized for your home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas. CT HIC 0628993
